cleaned_text: Four pediatric psychology positions: Yale Child Study Center Four pediatric psychology positions: Yale Child Study Center August 17, 2023 The YCSC Grand Rounds Committee is pleased to announce some of the distinguished speakers planned for the departmental lecture series on Tuesdays at 1 p.m. in the upcoming Fall semester.
